GSP28prakp11u:1131: saṃskāraparyavasāyī tu saṃskāravidhirna saṃskāryasya kāryaṃ kalpayet /

GSP28prakp11u:1158: ata eva tasminpakṣe niṣphale 'pi preraṇāsiddheḥ pravṛttissyāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1166: evaṃ tarhyaśrute prāśastye tadapekṣā mā bhūt /
GSP28prakp11u:1179: tathā ca na śābdabhāvanā vidhiriti siddham /

GSP28prakp11u:1234: sarve dhātvarthāśca kasyacidabhūtasya bhavane 'nukūlatāṃ bhajantaḥ karotyarthatāmāpannāḥ karotinā praṣṭum,
GSP28prakp11u:1239: api ca saprayatnakriyeṣu devattādiṣu vyāpārabhedasambhavāt ghaṭetāṃ praśnottare /
GSP28prakp11u:1264: api ca “pākaṃ karoti devadattaḥ” ityatra tāvatpacyarthaṃ pākaśabdo bravīti,
GSP28prakp11u:1278: yastu---“devadatta odanaṃ pacatī“tyādau vṛddhavyavahāre eva prakṛtyarthātirikte prayatne prayogādāravyātānāṃ tadarthatāmāha /
GSP28prakp11u:1284: nanu prābhākarā api bhāvanāvācakatāṃ na kathamāravyātapratyayasyecchanti /
GSP28prakp11u:1286: kintu kāryābhidhāyino liṅādayaḥ kāryasyānyathānabhidhānāt kṛtyabhidhāyina iṣyante /
GSP28prakp11u:1287: kṛtisambandhi hi kāryaṃ kṛtyanabhidhāne nābhihitaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1303: na cāsau parakṛtisambandhi svayaṃ kāryaṃ boddhumalamiti,
GSP28prakp11u:1323: tatra na kriyāmatraṃ tāvadahaṃ budhvā pravṛttaḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1362: tathā pravṛttirapi tanmātrāvagamāyattā na bhavatītyupekṣyaiva tāvat taṃ,

GSP28prakp11u:1379: kintu kṛtiṃ prati pradhānabhūtaṃ sat yat tadadhīnasattākam,
GSP28prakp11u:1390: na tasya kṛtiṃ prati prādhānyāvagamo1257 ghaṭate /
GSP28prakp11u:1416: ta eva kāryāvagatiṃ kurvantīti śabdāntaravalliṅādīnāṃ kāryavācakatvavyutpattisiddhiḥ // 10 //
GSP28prakp11u:1417: nanu lokavyavahārāt liṅādayo vācakatayā vyutpādyamānāṃ praiṣādiṣvevavacakatayā vyutpattimarhanti /
GSP28prakp11u:1421: pravarttyapuruṣāpekṣayā jyāyasā vaktrā pratipādyamānaṃ kāryaṃ praiṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1434: vastutastu praiṣādīnāmapi 1267pravṛttyavyabhicāritvātkāryasya ca pravṛttiṣu sarvāsu hetubhūtatvātpraiṣādiṣvapi liṅādīnāṃ kāryamevār'tha iti niścīyate // 12 //
GSP28prakp11u:1459: loke hi liṅādiyuktavākyaśravaṇe viśiṣṭakriyānuṣṭhānadarśanāttadviṣayā kāryāvagatirliṅādibhiḥ kriyata iti yuktam,
GSP28prakp11u:1466: liṅādiśravaṇe tu tathābhūtārthaṃparatayā1272 dhātuḥ prayukta ityavagamya,
GSP28prakp11u:1480: tena yadyapi lokānusāreṇa kriyāyā eva kāryatayā bodhyamānāyā vākyārthatvāt,
GSP28prakp11u:1490: tena tatsambandhātsādhyabhūtaṃ svargādi kāmyamānatayā puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi---
GSP28prakp11u:1501: na ca tasya sarvasya sādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:1506: dṛśyante hi grāmābhigamanakāmā 1280api yādṛcchikīṣu kriyāsu pravarttamānāḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1512: anyathā hi tatkāminā satā tatkāryatayānavabuddhaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1530: na ca teṣu svarūpanibandhana eva tatprayogaḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1544: tadānuguṇyena tādaśyāmeva prītau svargaśabdaḥ prayukta iti niścītate /
GSP28prakp11u:1550: ata eva ca vinaṣṭasyāpi karmaṇaśśāstreṇa sādhanatvaṃ bodhata iti ye bruvate,
GSP28prakp11u:1552: evaṃ cāsāvāśutaravināśinī kriyā svargakāminā niyojyena saha kāryatayā sambandhuṃ nār'hati,
GSP28prakp11u:1558: tena tasyā api niyojyasaṃbandho ghaṭata eva /
GSP28prakp11u:1580: devatāprasādasya phalaprayojakatvaśaṅkā 1293nanu yāgādikriyā devatārādhanopāyabhūtā satī kāryatayocyatām,
GSP28prakp11u:1588: na hi devatārādhanopāyabhūto yāga ityatra kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP28prakp11u:1597: na ca pramāṇāntareṇa devatāsādhanopāyatā ayāgasyāvagamyata ityuktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1607: devatādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 9. 1. 4] ca prapañcenāyamartho nirasta iti,
GSP28prakp11u:1615: śabdato vā puruṣasaṃskārahetutā yāgādīnāmavasīyata iti “karmāṇyārambhabhāvyatvādi” [mī. da. a. 11. pā. 1 sū. 20] tyatroktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1619: tadanyathānupapattyā tu kiñcidapyaparaṃ tañjanyaṃ phalodayānuguṇaṃ kālāntarasthāyyātmāśrayaṃ parikalpyatām,
GSP28prakp11u:1624: na ca kriyājanyenānyena phalajanakena kalpitena kriyāyāḥ phalasādhanatopapāditā bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:1625: na hi sādhanasādhanaṃ tasya sādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:1628: vyāpārayogitayaiva śaktimatāṃ sādhanatā yataḥna cā'tmasamavāyyarthāntaraṃ karmaṇāmavāntaravyāpāraḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1637: ṣaṣṭhādye tasyaiva kāryasya svasambandhitayā bodhyassvargakāmādirniyojya iti vyutpāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1639: tasya ca kāryasya niyojyaviśeṣaṇībhūtakāmyotpattihetutvamiti bādaryadhikaraṇe [mī. da. 3. 1. 3] rāddhāntitam /
GSP28prakp11u:1640: tacca tathābhūtaṃ kāryaṃ kriyārūpaṃ na bhavati,
GSP28prakp11u:1642: devatārādhanamukhena tāvat phalasādhanatā nāstīti devatādhikaraṇai [mī. da. 9. 1. 4] vyutpāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1644: karmaṇaḥ, tacktervā sthāyitā neti cāpūrvādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 2. 1. 2.] pratipāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1645: ato niyojyānvayamukhena mānāntarāpūrvamātmasamavāyi kāryaṃ liṅādibhirabhidhayata ityanekanyāyasādhyam /
GSP28prakp11u:1699: tacca prayojanākaṅkṣitayā prayojanībhūtena sādhikāreṇa niyogenānvīyata iti,
GSP28prakp11u:1742: viṣayānuṣṭhitau satyāṃ siddho na hi vidhiḥ phalam /
GSP28prakp11u:1781: anyathā yadi kaścitkalpite phale na pravartate,
GSP28prakp11u:1792: tatraitadeva tāvadvaktavyam---na kevalaṃ vede lokavyavahārādeva śabdārthāvadhāraṇam,
GSP28prakp11u:1795: etacca yavavarāhādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 1. 3. 5.] vyutpāditam 1329vyavahārata eva sambandhāvadhāraṇādubhayathāpi padāntarārthādhyavasānaṃ bhavatyeva,
GSP28prakp11u:1818: sitetara iva tveṣa pakṣaścittaṃ na karṣati /
GSP28prakp11u:1841: kāryamātrārthatve kriyaiva kāryatayā liṅādyartha iti niścīyate,
GSP28prakp11u:1846: tadā tasyāssvayaṃ duḥkharūpatvātpuruṣārthāntarānubandhanaṃ vina pravṛttyasambhavānniyamena sukhārthinaḥ pravṛttirna syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1854: phalaṃ vinā ca tadanupapatteḥ phalāvagamamapi sambhāvayet /
GSP28prakp11u:1856: sa eva vālyadaśāyāṃ vyutpannassvayamācāryapadavīmadhiruḍho vedārthaṃ pratītya,
GSP28prakp11u:1864: sarvathaiva1341 yato loke kriyā kāryaiva gamyate // 40 //
GSP28prakp11u:1871: apūrvaṃ hi kriyāsādhyaṃ sādhitā sādhanaṃ kriyā /
GSP28prakp11u:1879: yattu śrautapadārthe kārye loke liṅādi na prayujyata iti /
GSP28prakp11u:1883: sādhitā ca satī kriyā sādhanaṃ bhavatītyapūrveṇa saha kriyākāryatvaṃ1345 nityasambaddhamiti,
